commit.message:
Fix some bool vs. tree confusion.

	gcc/c/
	* c-parser.c (c_parser_omp_target): Return bool values.
	gcc/cp/
	* parser.c (cp_parser_omp_target): Return bool values.

From-SVN: r210851
